md:LocalizedInfo.md:TitleSort: Little House On The Prairie: Season 8 Episode 22 He Was Only Twelve - Part 2
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary190: As James lies in a coma at the Ingalls house, Charles increases the distress of his family by denying the child's impending death.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary400: As James lies in a coma at the Ingalls house, Charles increases the distress of his family by denying the child's impending death. Angry that nobody - not even Doc Baker - offers any hope for James' recovery, Charles takes his son away to the mountains, where he builds a temple and prays fiercely for a miracle.
md:LocalizedInfo.md:Summary4000: As James lies in a coma at the Ingalls house, Charles increases the distress of his family by denying the child's impending death. Angry that nobody - not even Doc Baker - offers any hope for James' recovery, Charles takes his son away to the mountains, where he builds a temple and prays fiercely for a miracle.
